flawed_nl_solution:
Evelyn takes 2 days a week off from work, so she is at work 7 - 2 = <<7-2=10>>10 days a week.
Thus, she uses 60 / 10 = <<60/10=6>>6 sheets of paper per day at work.
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
